name: Ashborne Town Square
description: This is the main meetingplace of Ashborne. Wide avenues flow off in all four cardinal directions, and many people are milling about the large fountain.

name: Ashborne, North Main Street
description: Main Street North, Ashborne. A wide and bustling avenue, filled with people milling about, and vendors shouting at you to buy their wares. You can hear the sound of livestock bussing goods to covered stalls.
